emuInput.TitMainTitle: Hubert Ivey, Father John LaBauve, Roland Sawyer, Henry Musamali, Peter Kanari, and James McCoy posed in Loendi Club for NAACP Young Adult meeting
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1962, pg. 17, reads: "AT NAACP MEET - Surprise visitors to the recent Young Adult meeting of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People, at the Loendi Club, were Henry Musamali (fourth from left) of Uganda, East Africa, and Peter Kanari, of Kenya, East Africa. The entire group includes (left to right), Hubert Isey [sic] president for the Young Adult NAACP; Fr. John LaBauve, paster of St. Richard Church; Roland Sawyer, Loendi president; Mr. Musamali, Mr. Kanari, and James McCoy, civil rights coordinator of District 16 of the United Steel Workers of America. - Harris Photo."
